text: Carelss staff. Overpriced for the quality. Ordered philly stake to go. Didn't check what is inside the package right away. Later, found inside artificial green colored and absolutely inedible burrito. 23 bucks for 1 veggie burrito and 2 bottles of soda. Terrible.

A late night option that isn't pizza and isn't fried everything. Open until 4am most nights, offering a large and truly healthy menu. 10z chicken breast sandwiches, burgers (including turkey), salads, smoothies, fresh juice, hummus, guac, baked sweet potato, and much more. Perfect spot if you're out late or work nights. The cops drop in here all the time, so it's really safe. You gotta be nice to Athena, especially if you're drunk.

I came to Jubilee for the first time for a late night snack, and first of all they still serve smoothies at 3AM! Amaaaazeballs! The pina colada smoothie was delicious and the service was even better! I'll definitely be back!

Great! I wanted something fresh to eat on a Saturday Night & this place was a hit!! Pineapple Smoothie made Fresh, marinated Chicken sandwich mmm,mmm good! The chicken mushroom on Pita Great!!!  I will definitely be making this place a part of my regular "go to" for good eats!!

I LOVE jubilee it is actually quality food late night oh and the staff is actually nice people. I haven't had a single bad experience at jubilee since the first time I went in 2015. Did I mention they deliver? Also, one of the best turkey burgers too I'm an aficionado.

My friend recommend I come here when I go To Chicago and they surely did not disappoint. They have the best food here! I love their smoothies too! They let you customize your smoothies free of charge. You need to try them out when you come to the city!

So, my partner and I just discovered this place a week ago and we've been back 3 times already! The veggie burger is one of the best in the city. It's also decently priced. A great place for vegetarians craving that "street food" taste.
This is a very cute healthy restaurant. I came here for some fresh squeezed juice and a veggie burger , they had both. Very satisfied, food is great !

Been dining with Jubilee Juice since I moved to the area in 2010, I've never had a bad thing here whether delivery or dine-in/pickup Usually i have one of their burgers with waffle fries, a cheese cup, and a smoothie.. tonight I branched out to the steak quesadilla and am I glad I did. Generous portions and good flavor with the salsa. I had the mango madness smoothie, fresh mango juice, sherbet. Yep, it will set you back a few $$ but it is worth it!
When you just want good food without the Restaurant Row hassle... this is the spot. Seriously, it's good change of pace place in the West Loop. And they are open late.

I've been coming here for years! Their chicken sandwiches are great and the food is always fresh. The fact that they're open late is a plus. So if you're looking for a spot with fresh food, fast this is the spot.
So good!! I love this place. It's fresh and fast and good any time of day. I love the salmon burger -- has a fresh taste and leaves you feeling healthy and satisfied.
Walking around with the wife and we stopped in. Smoothies were outstanding. Didn't get a chance to try the food, hence the 4 stars  .

This place has been one of my "go-to spots for nearly 20 years.  They have been in the healthy food/faster food component longer than anyone I know. When the time comes when you need a fresh squeezed juice,  but your dad wants a giant grilled juicy.chicken breast sandwich, and your girlfriend wants a tasty veggie bean burger at 3AM, this is the place.  PLEASE GO AND SAY HI TO TINA SHE IS THE EPITOME OF FRIENDLY AND PROFESSIONAL.

I've ordered their food four times now w/ friends.  I've gotten several different salads, the chicken sandwich, the italian beef and also their grilled vegetables.  Their orders have always been fast, correct and quite tasty.  I really like that they have a number of healthy refreshing options.  My favorite dish by far was their chicken sandwich.  I will definitely continue to order from them.

Juices and smoothies are tasty and reasonably priced given the large portions! Very quick service. Also had the Chicken Divine wrap which was also quite large and also yummy. Appears to be more of a pick up and go type of place even though they do have a small area for seating

An excellent little place on Halsted St. in the West Loop. The prices is great and the food taste awesome. You definitely get your money worth with large portions and quality fresh ingredients. The staff was friendly and the meals are prepared to order. They have a large selection on the menu from breakfast, lunch and dinner. Also, the serve fresh juices and smoothies. The small eating area is nothing special but it is a cozy fit. The only disappointment was the coffee was not available for Breakfast items. I would recommend trying the place.
Like for real doe... this place is da shit yo. Got the philly steak and it was better than I imagined it on the Fresh Prince of Bel Air. Come and get it  y'all - dis joint is 4 real.
This place here has an awesome turkey burger!!! Every time I'm in this area it's a must get.. I recommend anyone in this are to try this place out..The marinated chicken is good also..

Walked over here on a late night and dropped in for a quick bit on the way home. Super fun staff and they have a ridiculous amount of food options! Food is great and a chill group. Will stop by here again!
Great quality food .. every time I try something new it turns out very tasty and delicious

We drive by often and never got a chance to stop in, but TODAY we did! The restaurant provided excellent service and great food! The size of the smoothies can feed more than one person for the cost! Smoothies are amazing! Extremely well cooked and seasonrd Chicken Mustard and Corned Beef Sandwich! Wide array of food choices for everyone! We will definitely visit again!

Ordered a smoothie a couple times a week while spending time at the AbilityLab downtown. Mango Madness, tropical passion with c complex, and strawberry heaven. Great quality. Once a driver forgot one of the drinks but he came back and brought it.

My co-workers and I come here pretty often for lunch because... 1. Food is good.  2. It's affordable especially in the west loop area and you forget your lunch because you were rushing out the door and decided that an extra 5 mins of sleep was more important than getting up and preparing lunch.  3. It's close to the office and the portion size is more than enough.  Haven't had 1 issue here. Chicken quesadillas is what my girlfriend and I always get and split. A perfect mini lady lunch date.  And of course a cookie to top it all off! Definitely a place to check out.

The food is very good. The service is not at all pleasant. They never smile and seem they do not care to be there. After 5-6 years of coming here getting the same thing the sandwich was not up to par, I asked for more sauce and they decided to charge me. I told the register gal I would show her they did not put extra on but it did not phase or waiver her decision to charge me more than all the times before.
This restaurant's menu has many choices. Cozy dining area is available for seating. Drinks are delicious.

Food always soooo good. I get the chicken sometimes and wait a little longer but it's always great. I get one of the popular shakes and I'm happy. The ginger ale they have is absolutely bonkers. This seems to be more than you would ususally pay but not really for the quality I believe.  I haven't had a bad experience there yet and have been there quite a few times eating inside.  They have a delivery car that I have seen as well.  Got the turkey burger, waffle fries, and a strawberry banana shake. Yes please! Pretty chill atmosphere inside.  I constantly forget the name of the place every time for some reason and always have to find it on map apps when I do. LoL. Hmmm what else, try it and you should be happy.  Blah blah blah end rant now I think.  -Jason
The smoothies are the best in the city.i drive from very far to come get a smoothie here the staff is really friendly and is a great place in the Fulton market area.
Mushroom chicken is my favorite. Parking could be hustle but I usually order for pick up. Fair price for delicious sandwiches.
Staple in the West loop, my go to after work to refuel. Pleasant service and fast, even at 2am and the place is filled with drunkards. Solid food, large menu
I love jubilee juice it's great for quick takeout, everything In the area is so expensive so it's great to stop in here and get food to go!

The burgers are always nice and juicy. The waffle fries are fried to a nice crisp, not overly done like most other joints. The service is quick and explanations are thorough. Definitely a top burger spot when other food joints aren't working out.
Amazing cookies. Def go to place in Chicago. Will def be back once I'm in town. Open late what else do you need!

This place is great for smoothies and fresh squeezed juice ! The hours are great for late night munchies, because they also have sandwiches and desserts. And if you don't feel like leaving your house, they deliver. Good food, reasonable prices, and friendly staff.

Jubilee has been my go to spot for nourishment near down town Chicago for many seasons. Much like the atonement celebration of its namesake, this place is rooted in positive and steadfast vibrations. The menu is expansive, and the service is for real; Tina is the best! And after all, where else can you get 4am wheatgrass shots beyond the under-ground?
Juices, smoothies & food. I order fresh juice & Wheatgrass from here almost every other day. Friendly fast service.
Best waffle fries in whole CHICAGO! Burgers are quite juicy but DO not forget the waffle fries. Waffle fries are better than chick-fil-a ones too;)
Such a find. The perfect place for lunch.  I love their sandwiches, wraps, and juices!!!
I love this place, A variety of foods, and I love that sell Breakfast too! They're 24 hour convenient and You guys should definitely try their Smoothies!
Very good beef, and nice service. Open 24/7 so you can come any time of the night! Also plenty of healthy dishes for all you health ppl!

There food is amazing. I love the variety of food selections and majoroof them are healthy.  Their smoothies are to die for. I love the Pineapple craze especially with the added fruits I get and, the wait is not that long

I'm giving this place two stars not Bc of the quality of the food but Bc of service. We come here every morning after our 5 am workout and we get smoothies. Uhm there hours are for 7 am. They AREA NEVER OPEN ON TIME! it's three ppl out her waiting and no one is even in the building. This is pitiful. More ppl need to complain and they need to do better. Even with the food being great I will not spending money with someone who don't respect my time.

I've only been here for the smoothies and they have always been fantastic. I can't wait to come back for lunch sometime. The prices are reasonable for the portions you get, and the service has been great. One of my favorite spots for a quick drink that's refreshing and always fresh
Went here because I wanted a fast option on restaurant row. The bright sign is welcoming and open late. Great options for vegetarians. Try the burgers!

The owner is terribly rude. I don't even understand how anyone could even want to come to this place with her awful attitude. I honestly recommend she just people work for her because the food is good.
Great tasting chicken burgers. The best waffle fries in town. The only thing it's missing is calories listed on the menu. This is my go-to spot.

This place is amazing. Been coming here for 15 years and the quality has always been top notch. The chicken on sandwiches is*huge* and always juicy and flavorful. The salads are fantastic with great dressings. Love!!!

The food and service is amazing. Although one of my orders got messed up, the staff was more than happy to correct it. My favorite is the New York Steak sub with the hot sauce. I also recommend the Cranberry Pleasure smoothie, very delicious and refreshing. Will definitely be coming back soon!
I go here every opportunity I have to get their smoothies and their shrimp quesadillas. Everything is tasty here and you get excellent service
Really yummy chicken divine. This place is down the street from me and open late. Love it!

Best juices and smoothies in the west side Chicago. Vegetarian friendly and a perfect location. My favorite: Blueberry Banana Smoothie or the Cold Fighter for when im under the weather. Check it out!!

Wow just found this place. I've been missing out. Great food and smoothies for a cheap price and they deliver late! A lot of healthy options made in a quick fast food fashion. The food was so good I forgot to take a pic until halfway done with the veggie burger I was devouring.  Will definitely be back, and... I heard they deliver.. ;)
Great late night eat, and always friendly service.  I highly recommend fixing your cravings with a fairly healthy menu here.

These guys made me a smoothie with plastic in it once, and I also found a hair in my chicken sandwich the other time I went there. Never again, horrible customer service as well. The previous review was just so I could Get a free cookie . That's why they have a high yell score lol. Cause everyone who gives them 5 stars gets a free cookie
THIS PLACE IS GREAT!! They have amazing smoothies and their burgers are fenomenal! The workers are super friendly and they're open almost all day! I highly recommend this grill!

This was my first visit to Jubilee. Late Saturday night. Big menu, everything looks good, and they have Merkts!!! Bonus right there! I got the cheddar bacon chicken sandwich and cheddar fries. It was all delicious and I will definitely be back.
The best chicken sandwiches in chicago. Very late chicken breast and awesome waffle fries.
This is a fantastic fast food joint, very bare bones, but perfect for carry-out. I would recommend the turkey burger and fries. Enjoy!
Speedy service and righteous chicken. Nice salad choices. Offer good soup too. Take it to go or eat there.
Friendly folks, excellent food. Jubilee is a company favorite being in Fulton. We go for the Marinated Chicken Sandwich and side of waffle fries. It's definitely worth checking out!

Jubilee is a lunch hot spot for West Loopers! Their large chicken sandwiches are the best bang for your buck. Just steps from the Halsted bus stop, Jubilee is also a great place to stop for a quick, made to order breakfast!
The best burgers and smoothies EVER!! The service is grand as well. Try one of their lavender specialty sodas.

For sure the best smoothies in chicago. My favorite is the blueberry bananas Everything on the menu is great. They have everything from salads, vegetarian options and burgers!! The ingredients are always so fresh and everything is consistent. It's also great because they are open super late (4am). You can't go wrong with his place!!!
this place is seriously my favorite. try the bluberry bannana smoothe and the rueban. its unreal. open late, healthy eats!
Stopped in after driving for Uber during the snowstorm- had a buffalo chicken sandwich- to die for!

They have really good quality food---don't expect to come in here if you're looking for like a greasy gyro spot. That also means don't expect the prices of a greasy gyro spot. You'll pay more here, but it's for legit food. They also don't keep things under a heat lamp so plan to wait about 10 minutes for your food. Usually I get a grilled chicken sandwich or salad, both taste great. The veggie quesadilla is amazing. Have not tried their juices but they fresh squeeze them in house so I imagine they are good as well.

I had the buffalo chicken sandwich. The chicken was very high quality and the sauce was very flavorful and spicy. The prices are reasonable considering the quality of the food.  Most sandwiches are $8-10.

This place has everything! From smoothies to quesadillas, I can't imagine a better place for late night food. We got the chicken quesadilla which was probably one of the best I've ever had. Highly recommend for anyone in the neighborhood!

I treat myself to Jubilee Juice and Grill every now and again for a nice,  well made,  filling lunch near the office.  Great healthy selection and generous portions. Perfect for a working lunch kind of situation.  The smoothies are a clear draw too.  Can't go wrong !

I love this place. To me, it's "Chicago" through and through. A little greasy, a little healthy.....you decide. The open-faced grill with the selection of sandwiches and burgers are awesome. I'm vegetarian so there are SO many things I can choose. You can grab a delicious smoothie or juice with it.  You can go healthier with a salad too, if that's what you want. The real beauty of Jubilee is the fact that it's open SO late AND it delivers. What more do you want?!? Plus the creepy fruit characters in the artwork are just too good not to stare at.  This place won my heart. I think I've eaten here at least 20 times. Oh, and....punch cards. Yesssss
This place is legit, best smoothies I've had in s long time. The burger was delicious and they came with some amazing waffle fries. Service was fast and friendly! Def coming back! #magicofjoanne
Love this place. They are so nice and the chicken is amazing, I work across the street and am always impressed with the food.
Clean...fair prices...large portions...good quality large menu. Had waffle fries and Philly steak...delicious. Great random stop and will return.

I have been going to Jubilee Juice for a few years now and it has ALWAYS been amazing. It's family owned and you can tell by how sweet the employees are. It's always clean and smells like delicious smoothies. I've tried almost all of the smoothies and they're all fantastic. Although they seem a bit expensive at $6-7 (I'm a broke college student) it is worth every penny. There is a ton of fresh fruit and you can add different supplements like wheatgerm for health benefits. I recommend the Portabella Mushroom and Goat Cheese Sandwich. Fucking delicious.
There are so many options on the menu and everything looks good!! We got two smoothies and they were both great. The staff is also very friendly and welcoming.
Love the shrimp quesadilla and chicken shawarma. Fries and marinated chicken are great too. Love the smoothies too always fresh

Love this place for good food and healthy fare. Lots of delicious juices and smoothie options. Everything is very fresh. They have one of the best turkey burgers in the city. For a treat I also love Peggy's cookies and the lemonade. Highly recommend that you phone your order in during peak times. It gets crowded!

Jubilee Juice has been one of my favorite Smoothie shops in the Chicago land areas. Not once have I been disappointed with the quality of food or service. I highly recommend stoping by this establishment if ur in the area.

All chicken sandwiches are all tasty. The food is not expensive and you get a great portion. I had the blueberry banana smoothie. Their smoothie selections are great too. The service is fast and the employees are nice.

Ive been in jubilee a couple of times and let me tell you that they have a variety of really healthy and delicious meals and drinks. I love their buffalo sandwich and soups but more than everything their salads. Their smothies are extra yummilicious. Can't wait to go back

This is hands down the best smoothie place in the entire city of Chicago. If you're looking for fruity, smooth, and absolutely great tasting; then this is the place for you! Service was amazing and prompt. Although they were busy when I went there, they were still able to provide me with quick service, which was much appreciate. Definitely a 10/10 for service, taste, and quality. Thank you, Jubilee Juice & Grill! :)

Great food will always make you come back!! Burgers all natural 1/2 pound and smoothies are the best..waffle fries and turkey burgers are delicious..staff is friendly and it's clean in the waiting area...food comes usually quick and parking is avaliable !

Excellent service and timely recommendations. Have gone in on multiple occasions and the service has been consistently efficient. Even gave us free samples of smoothies at off times! Fantastic service all around and friendly people every time.
Top 5 turkey burger. Super quick service. The best oatmeal raisin cookie in Chicago. Best to get there before the after club let out. Otherwise you will be in for a wait.

I really dig this place. for the longest time I just thought they did juices and such so I never went in but I was wrong.  their sandwiches and waffle fries are amazing, plus they do a cheddar and bacon baked potato that I will probably forever order.  my beef: I couldn't order online and go pickup, then when I showed up the lady at the register seemed clueless. I asked about stuff on the menu and she said they didn't have it, only when the cook heard me ask did he come over and tell her they did. it was a little weird but not enough to keep me from coming back.
Don't go here expecting ambiance. Go for good healthy food and nice portions at good prices. Their salads are huge and their grilled chicken on the salad and "burgers" is super yummy.

They got everything you need here from healthy options to fresh pressed juices. I love their carrot and celery juice. They have great fries as well. They deliver late night, so that's a bonus if you're in the neighborhood.
I came into this place thinking it was Jamba Juice! I'm so glad I made that mistake. They have the best waffle fries I have ever tasted I'm Chicago. I will die for them.

Ordered the waffles fries and was VERY happy with my choice! They are absolutely delicious, just the right amount of salt and cooked to perfection. Needless to say I will be back to enjoy more! I also had the mango madness smoothie with whey protein and that proved to be another excellent choice! Really hit the spot for a quick bite.
This is my third time here.  The food is made to order and is always excellent.  I will continue to come back!
A small restaurant with a lot of choices! Super Fast service. Kettle chips and great sides
Turkey burgers are awesome but my favorite is the Caesar Salad w/salmon. Can't go wrong with either one
Juice, guacamole, and Malibu chicken sandwiches galore, this healthy joint has it all. Absolutely out of this world health food. Personal favorite is how healthy the guacamole tastes.

Who uses goat cheese for a quesadilla? Wtf. I ask for a side of guac since I just paid $8+ for two tortillas and cheese basically and she informs me it'll be "$3 extra". Are you kidding? I work in the area and would have loved to come here regularly but no. Just no.

If you're like me, you probably assume a regular, grilled chicken breast sandwich can't have flavor. You order them anyway because you kind of like them anyway and perhaps are a bit of a masochist (or simply unimaginative), but you're resigned to the fact that your sandwich will not be flavorful. I am happy to tell you that, if you order that chicken sandwich from Jubilee Juice, you are wrong. This place changed my expectations for a grilled chicken sandwich. It's not just juicy, it's delicious. I also like the chicken philly and the waffle fries. Burger isn't bad either. (Don't get the Philly cheesesteak though. It's not very good. If you want something like that and you're set on ordering from here anyway, stick with the chicken Philly).
Best. Smoothies. EVER. The food is great, (lots of healthy options),  the staff is always nice, and they're open super late.  My only complaint is that they aren't close to where I live.
Was in the West Loop and needed a quick bite. This place hit the spot. Great food and especially tasty fries for a fair price. I definitely recommend.
Philly cheese steak tastes like Chinese food. The smoothies are great, food not so much.

This place is awesome - fresh and affordable and very consistent. My favorite is the chicken divine but I'm also in love with the mushroom chicken. One of the best parts is the waffle cut fries - I like them well done and if I feel like splurging, I'll get the cheese sauce.

It's currently 1:04AM, I'm hanging out with a few friends and my friend Jose recommended to go to Jubilee Juice and try the tropical passion smoothie. This smoothie is epic. Has all the fruits I love. Strawberries, mango juice, and peaches. I love tangy juices, and this smoothie was just too good! Awesome experience! Defiantly coming back soon!

In a neighborhood of restaurants that like to charge $20 for a cheeseburger, Jubilee really offers a wide selection of food that affordable and delicious. This place has been a staple off the Randolph corridor for years and they will for a long time. Not to mention the smoothies are made fresh to order :)

Really friendly service and bomb ass smoothies. Came in and the menu was really straightforward about is food and smoothies. I had the Tropical Passion with a C Complex boost and it was amazing. Definitely worth a visit.

This place looks very cute! Overall we had a good experience. I ordered a buffalo chicken sandwich. It was okay, the sauce comes on the side and it was very messy, not really the buffalo ranch flavor I was looking for,  and there was no washroom. However, the chicken itself was decent and a good portion.  My boyfriend ordered the chicken quesadilla which was humongous and very cheesy with mushrooms also. The chicken quesadilla was delicious and I liked it a lot more than the sandwich. It came with salsa which was pretty good as well. There are some really cute pictures of fruits playing outside in the seating area.

A wonderful experience! The staff was incredibly friendly and patient with our group. The fresh squeezed juice was amazing, as was the food. Big juicy burgers, tasty waffle fries and a crucial food belly.
If you're ever craving a smoothie late at night this might be your only option. I got the fruit divine smoothie. By the way, I highly recommend the chicken divine sandwich!
Has a lot of food choices.  It is cheap and healthy alternatives. AND HAS MANY SMOOTHIES .
Jubilee has great food and wonderful cookies. If you're near Greektown, definitely check it out. - VSW
Amazing. Great customer service. Gus is so sweet! The food is so fresh! Good burgers, fries, and smoothies especially. Great place to stop by.
This is a great place. Healthy but open late. Food is tasty and honest. Staff is friendly and helpful. I am looking forward to coming back.
I love Jubilee!! Their smoothies and cookies are delicious and the customer service is the best!! Always order from them late night too!! (:
Honestly love this place so much. Couldn't ask for more! The fruit is so fresh. So love the cheesecake, cookies, smoothie, everything!!
BEST BURGER!  These guys super rocked! i ordered from them 2 times this week and they are on time and deliver but their burger is expensive. But it is a BIG burger so I cannot say much against it!

I'm another rock climber that stumbled upon this place. Hungry but on the move, I got a baked potato and a cookie. They were great and I was definitely satisfied. Jubilee has a good, easy going vibe and a nice staff
slow service, flavorless smoothies, overpriced everything. overall, terrible experience, would not come again

Great lunch spot to grab and go. They also have a seating area if you want to eat there. I ordered a turkey burger and waffle fries. Both were delicious. Coworker ordered a salad and the chicken looked like it was cooked perfectly. Will definitely go back to try the juices.

A great late night food option in the area. Service is always fast and friendly. I like how they've found a good balance between healthy and greasy. I've only ever done carryout, and the food is consistently delicious. Waffle Fries are a must try, they always make them fresh!
Jubilee always takes care of me morning, noon, or night. Totally fresh food with a "greasy spoon" taste. Philly Steak is awesome, breakfast options as good, and smoothies to keep it healthy.

The pineapple craze is so good!!! Refreshing, huge portion, and tastes fresh and healthy! The service is also great - people are quick and kind :). So glad I found this place!!! They also have tons of food on the menu, so feel free to come in famished, or just for a snack :)
Came in because I had a late night juice craving.. Such a nice Yelp surprise - free cookie when you check in! The medium juice is not only HUGE but awesome and fresh.. Will definitely be back!
Great lunch stop. My co-worker and I usally come here to grab the BBQ Salad but the sandwiches are awesome as well. Freshly made juices to order are great for the healthy summer body.

Amazing! Burgers, waffle fries, huge smoothies!! All soooo delicious. We stumbled upon this place after an afternoon of rock climbing and Jubilee exceeded my expectations! And to think, this place is open to 4am! Everything is made right in front of you and is so tasty. Check it out!

Love this place.. The quesadillas were pretty good and I usually come for the fresh juices... I think they should be organic for the price, but oh well they are still pretty darn good. The salmon burgers can be a miss or hit depending on whose in the kitchen....they are opening until the wee hours of the night and it's NOT drive thru food so I APPROVE!!

This place is just fantastic! Secret gem in the city. I order online all of the time in Chicago, and I stumbled upon Jubilee two weeks ago and received better quality food than I ever would have expected from a late night delivery place. Great options. Super dishes. Seriously, give them a shot and they won't disappoint.

A wonderful little place that's sure to make you feel good. The Jubilee Chicken sandwich is delicious & hits-the-spot; Kettle-Brand "Honey Dijon" potato chips are interesting; Hank's Gourmet Root Beer is super tasty & has the right amount of foam. I tried the waffle fries + cheese & it tasted similar to macaroni & cheese, which is incredible! I definitely recommended this place to all!
The cheese waffle fries were actually the highlight of the meal, the cheese was so much better than the normal stuff. My quesadilla was perfectly crispy as well. Good prices for great food!

Stopped in here for the very first time. Clean and friendly and lots of healthy options. I had the spinach beet salad with red onions and a vinaigrette dressing. Healthy fast and delicious. I'll stop in again and get something off the grill or a smoothie.

Cheese Fries. Delicious Smoothies. This place is my late night go to! First of all, if you are in a pinch for some late night eats...this is your spot. They have a lot of veggie friendly options!! Their salads are on point any time of the day or night...and their cheese fries are great after a night out. They are fast and delicious. And, I looooove their smoothies.
We came here because we wanted to get a smoothie but the simple wait for this smoothie was extremely long.  The cookies were really good, it had the right amount of everything.
this food is like crack it keeps u coming back and it stays open late and it opens early ooomg is the best i can describe this joint no bs

Amazing smoothies and great food at very reasonable prices. This is my go to spot for lunch when in Chicago. Try the goat cheese quesadillas, the salmon or mushroom burgers, and a razzleberry smoothies. So good!

I used to work right near Jubilee Juice and when I moved to SF I really missed it. Came back to the west loop just for this restaurant. Favorite smoothies include Blueberry Banana, Mango Madness, and Razzleberry. For food, most everything is good but I always get chicken quesadillas, mushroom avocado burger, or salmon burger. You really can't go wrong here.
The atmosphere is pleasant.  The space is very clean and the hours are MAGNIFICENT.  The staff is also very friendly and accommodating.

First time trying this place ordered a Turkey Burger on spinach wrap (amazing, best turkey burger I've EVER had) and strawberry heaven smoothie (super delicious) The piña colada smoothie was also good (daughters pick). Looking forward to trying more items on the menu!
Fantastic turkey burger cooked to perfection! Friendly staff with just the right amount of space to eat.  I'll definitely eat here again.

This place has great music playing while you wait for you order.  The smoothies here are the best ones around, they make it in front of you. The set up is nice where you can enjoy your burger with some spicy ketchup. Check it out.

A little pricey but WELL worth the $!  The chicken sandwiches are phenomenal & fairly large. The waffle fries & smoothies are also delicious if they're in the budget!! I've never been disappointed & am even more excited now that I know they deliver 24 hours a day!
Excellent place to eat, their burgers are wonderful. Definitely make sure to grab a smoothie they're to die for! Pineapple craze is where it's at
Never a disappointment with the food and service! The salmon burgers, turkey burger, waffle fries are the go to choice.

Sorry for the swearing but what an awesome fucking place, late night of not this place delivers. I have been here both for early lunch and juice and not going to lie but after-club too and it has yet to disappoint. If you are ever in the are you need to check it out!!

Perfect for late-night cravings as it's by far the best restaurant, not serving pizza, at 1-4am. The burgers and chicken sandwiches are great. Definitely don't leave without grabbing a smoothie.  Downside is Jubilee is pretty expensive. Our office tends to joke about putting our lunches there on layaway. A sandwich ($7-10), small fries ($4), and small smoothie ($6) will set you back nearly $20.
Great quality! I ordered eggs avocado and spinach and the order tasted amazing. Their smoothies also a must have!

Good food, but better for dining in than it is for delivery.  The delivery service they use is not very strong, and the restaurant does not pack the food in containers that retain heat.  Consider maintaining higher quality by shrinking your delivery zone, or delivering your food in  better materials.  I am also sick of drivers who clearly want people to walk down for food.  It's the job you signed up for, and you're getting a portion of the deliver fee (presumably), if not all of it, and also a tip. If you don't want to climb stairs, drive Uber (or stick with Uber, because this place may utilize Uber drivers).  Anyway, food was super late (almost 30 minutes past an already lengthy 1 hour estimate) and cold.  Not worth the $40 I spent.
Thames have a wide variety of choices which makes it great. Friendly environment to chill once you complete your order. And the customer service is excellent .

A friend and i stopped in on a whim. I let him coerce me into the Philly cheese steak, but was pleasantly surprised. Loved the merits cheddar on the fries! I tried to pay like a jerk, but the credit card machine was off.... I'll get you next time, gadget... NEXT TIME!!!!! Ohhh and the ginger ale was great! Next time I will try a smoothie too! :)

Amazing cheddar and bacon burger, friend had the philly cheese steak. I picked at hers and she had some of mine. Both were amazing. Friendly staff, quick service and huge menu! I would definitely recommend this to friends.

My daughter and I ordered a spinach, strawberry and goat cheese salad with chicken, a smoked ham and cheese sandwich and a whole lot of waffle fries and it was all delicious (especially, surprisingly, the salad, which are not usually that good at burger places). I had torn a ligament in my knee and couldn't make it down the stairs to pay so I asked my kid to go down, sign the receipt and gave her $10 cash for a tip. About a half an hour later, full and happy, I got a phone call. Apparently my 11 year old gave the delivery guy the $10 cash but also wrote $10 on the tip line on the receipt. They were calling to let me know and said that they thought it was probably a mistake and just charge the credit card $10 less. Seriously? They so easily could have made some extra beer money off of me but were very kind and offered to fix the situation. Tis the season so I told them to give the $20 to the delivery guy but even if I was on the fence about their food (which Im not) I would go just to support such great people

I've yet to try the food here, but the smoothies are wonderful.  They might be kind of pricey but I'll still buy them anyway. They're not too icy, and full of real fruit (so refreshing). That's a win-win in my smoothie book. I also love how they're open super late at night/super early, meaning I can always fulfill my smoothie craving any time of the day. This is great since other smoothie places close early!

Fresh food, big portions and friendly people. Plenty of vegetarian options, which is a huge bonus. The smoothies are icing on the cake. Work in the west loop and this is the go to for a good quick grub.

This place rules. I work next door and used to always come in just for their smoothies until I tried their food. Out of this world good vegetarian options. The mixed veggie sandwich with eggplant, goat cheese and asparagus is my favorite. Their soup of the day is always really good and fresh. Staff is always so nice and quick.
The food and the service here is always amazing! So many delicious fresh smoothies to choose from (My favorite is the Cranberry Pleasure). The best chicken sandwiches EVER!  My fav late night spot.

Left a club to search for late night drunk food. It was only not even 2 am but everywhere else's kitchen seemed to be closed already. After walking through the cold stopping at maybe four other places, stumbling upon this humble little grill was a godsend. I bought an Italian beef with provolone and, separately, the cheddar waffle fries, after a recommendation from the very nice and friendly person at the register; I had my eye on a bag of chips but she cautioned me that the fries were much better for only slightly more. They both came out hot, quick, and delicious. Highly recommended, especially if you are inebriated but still looking for better than McDonald's!
Great place to grab a salad. The smoothies are always on point! And they're playing footloose music right now:).

They have excellent customer service & treat you really nice. The colors & decor are bright & artistic. It's a warm environment & everything is made fresh on the scene. The salmon burger is top notch & the ladies be in there after the club if you are a player with the desire to Mack somebody down after hours. Enjoy it!
Come here, get the marinated chicken sandwich, and leave happy. There's nothing flashy about this place, but it's great for a quick lunch.

The food is good but the people there need to learn phone manners! I called to confirm that they deliver to my area (which on their menu, it states they do). The fist person I spoke to said he thinks so & asked. Then after a few minutes he said they don't. I explained that their menu states they do & I'm 3 blocks before their delivery cut off. He put me on hold again. Then some rude lady with a strong accent says "we don't deliver there" a few times in a row & tried to rush me off the phone. I nicely told her that they might want to change their delivery map on menu & she hung up! I WILL NOT be ordering from there again simply because of her unprofessional attitude! Mind you- I usually order take out there ALL the time for the 17 people that I work with in a physicians office- NEVER AGAIN. My office & I will spend our $ elsewhere.
They have the best juice smoothies - fresh, fast, and full of flavor!!! Perfect for a quick lunch or snack mid day when you want a healthy option.
Amazing food! Me and my girlfriend come here every week. Amazing smoothies and healthy food. Definitely a must go!

Updated review: my first visit was ended with me throwing away my Italian sausage. After my last Yelp review the manager was very apologetic and offered a $10 credit for me to give them another try.  I was not disappointed this time! I ordered the Malibu chicken sandwich and their waffle fries. Usually waffle fries aren't my favorite but they were hot, perfectly salted and delicious. The chicken sandwich was huge! From the minute I opened it I knew there was no way I'd be able to finish it, but hey leftovers are great! The chicken was juicy and just overall very delicious. So happy this place made a come back for me!

Food is basic but good however, I ordered over the phone and the woman was beyond rude. Yelling at me because she couldn't understand my order. When the order was complete she hung up without even validating my purchase. I will no longer order from here simply because of her rude behavior.

This place is great! I had their chicken sandwhich which was very delicious. Like it had been marinated all night. The portion of the chicken sandwhich was pretty big and could almost be shared by 2 people.  I also ordered a fresh smoothie from there which was very good. The ingredients were fresh and the food was flavorable! I would recommend

I only worked near this place for a few short months, and that was well over a year ago, but I still miss it. I have to visit. The Char Portabella sandwich is one of my favorite sandwiches in the city. Plump strips of portabella mushroom with generous layers of goat cheese. So memorable, so good.  Smoothies aren't bad either, they'll customize them for you to a certain extent.
Always on point! Great lively staff loooovvvee this place! I haven't tried one thing I didn't like! Great for cheat days and healthy meals!
Good food but it's cooked to order so it can take a while to get food. Waffle fries with cheddar are awesome, smoothies are good and sandwiches and salads are good. Food is quality and fresh.
The veggie wrap was so good and the quesadilla wasn't your regular cheddar cheese. Almost ate all of my boyfriend's food because the goat cheese was that good. Would definitely go there again.

I rarely write reviews here, but this place inspired me after only one delivery order. I got hungry this morning and wanted to splurge on some breakfast delivery. I got the veggie omelette, but I needed to fill the delivery minimum, so I got their chicken quesadilla as well (for lunch). Oh. My. God. The omelette, the potatoes with them, even the toast (looks whole grain to me). Fantastic all the way around. They didn't forget a thing! Butter, jellys, and I even paid extra for sour cream for the quesadillas and they hooked me up with an extra container. The quesadillas are amazing. Goat cheese, poblano and chicken on a spinach tortilla, made with FRESH salsa! I need to go to here.

Love their fresh squeezed juices and smoothies. Everything is made fresh and I've been trying out all their salads really delicious and really creative. It's hard to find someplace that sells fresh food and opens late and also they deliver

I eat out almost everyday and its hard to find tasty healthy food.  So this is my new go to spot , their salmon burgers are a 10 turkey burgers a 10 grilled chicken breast sandwich and add honey mustard a 10 and I don't even like French fries  but I can't get enough of their waffle fries but the best thing on the menu is the shrimp quesadillas

I've been ordering from Jubilee for several years since it's about two blocks down from my condo. Our typical order consists of the honey mustard chicken sandwhich, waffle fries, maybe a burger here and there...The food is always good. They've had minor errors with our orders in the past but have always fixed them with no issues. On their menu they offer to use a spinach wrap for any of their sandwhiches. Latley, I have been requesting a chicken cesar wrap and it is always delicous (It's not on their menu but they make it) They are open super late which I love. The only minor fall back is that even though they are only two blocks from me, and even when I do order past 11pm, it takes over an hour. We waited about 75 minutes the other night for two sandwhiches. Maybe it's my fault for being so lazy to go pick it up but could be worse I guess.

I came here on a Thursday night, around 1 am, after the bars for a burger, since Au Cheval was still crazy busy. I ordered the Cheddar 'N Bacon Burger, which was below average, as far as burgers go for me. It took around 20 minutes to get and it was lukewarm and the bacon didn't have much flavor.  My friend ordered the Buffalo Chicken Sandwich, which had zero buffalo/hot sauce on it... Just a plain grilled chicken sandwich. BLAND  Sorry, but there's better quality fast food options, in my opinion... But that's not to say I wouldn't come back to give their juices/smoothies a try.

This place makes the most delicious chicken sandwich.  It's juicy and big!  Been coming here for years and never had a bad meal!  Cant go wrong with their waffle fries either! Open late and fast service.
Do not ever order delivery. Shows up an hour later, soggy and cold. If you need food delivered go somewhere else!!!
Great Turkey Burger! My other favorites include the mushroom quesadilla and the grilled chicken with goat cheese- Yum!!

Definitely recommend.  I stayed a hotel close by and had them deliver a turkey burger, waffle fries and a strawberry smoothie.  Like one of the other reviewers noted the turkey burger was probably one of the best turkey burger I've ever had.  Waffle fries are great and the smoothie was very good.    Including delivery the cost was $23.  Very reasonable for the good-quality food that I received.   The meal was delivered hot and within 30 minutes of ordering it.
Chicken sandwich... Chicken sandwich. Do it! Open late & great food! Kinda pricey but you get what you pay for, & here, it's worth it

I've been going to this place for a couple of years now. I used to take the brown line from the Kimball stop when I lived more north of the city for their veggie burgers. Then I got hooked on their fresh juice and wheatgrass shots. And, you can't beat 6.50 for 32oz. of fresh squeezed-right-before-your-eyes juice. Plus their grilled chicken sammies are crackin' and the salads are delish. This one with the black olives and creamy feta...LorT!? Whole Foods for what? Support this small business for your fresh juices, salads, and right off the grill sandwiches.
They offer plenty of healthy food-awesome. But charge an arm and a leg for it- boo. I ordered food recently for two and it cost me $50 for takeout. Yikes.

I like this place. The smoothies and juices are great. Everything is made fresh to order, which can cause quite a wait depending on the time of day. If possible, call in advance. Parking nearby is pretty limited. There's is a 15 minute standing zone right in front and paid parking right out front, but you're competing with traffic from the several other surrounding restaurants.  I've only had the turkey burger here. It was just ok--good enough to try again if necessary but not something I'd run here for.  I know it's a grill spot but I hate the taste of the grill. They have an assortment of kettle chips that I absolutely love. I have to get back to get a salad. They look great!  Seating is extremely limited! Most people order to go.

Came in on a Saturday night and waited 40 minutes for a sad veggie quesadilla and Reuben with fries. When asked to just have a refund so we could just leave, they told us we could not get one. That resulted in waiting an extra ten minutes for the food that was "working" to come up. Finally got home to a veggie quesadilla my three month old nephew could make better. Another couple that ordered before us experienced the same problem so our two tickets were just somehow forgotten about. The only difference is, is that they got their money back, so they do allow refunds, just not to me apparently! I've dined here before and have never had any problems so was completely disappointed and turned off by their kitchen expo.

Jubilee chicken sandwich was fantastic and the ceaser salad was real good. I've eaten there plenty of times and have yet to be disappointed. The steak quesadilla is also fantastic and they make delicious cookies as well.

LOVE jubilee. I used to work on Randolph/halsted and jubilee is a great option. Great soups, enormous sandwiches, great fries. My favorite turkey burger in the city. Sort of pricey, but HUGE portions.

Fck this place. Took 15 minutes for them to START making my order then they copped an attitude when I noted that orders that were place after mine were being cooked. Not only did the bitch behind the counter snap, "It's actually only been 11 mintues," I had t school her and reply, "I put in my order at 11:01 and now it's 11:16" while holding up my receipt. Math is hard, yo. My whole party was done eating, my order hadn't even been started, and everyone clearly wanted to go. Then to top it off the food was inedible.

Good food, nice staff. I was positively impressed by a few things at Jubilee. One time I ordered mixed vegetables as a side, and I saw the staff go in back and chop all of the vegetables and bring them to the grill for my side. I realize that this isn't the most efficient way to do it, but I appreciated the wait for the freshness of it, rather than grabbing a tub of chopped vegetables that has been stored in a cooler for a week. I've also watched them hand mix a few turkey burger patties when I ordered one. Maybe this attention to freshness is achieved due to a large portion of their business being fresh smoothies

Don't get me wrong, their food is delicious; however their customer service and business etiquette gives them one star. I work in CS (customer service) myself and know the importance of CS, so I treat others the way I would like to be treated. With that being said SIX years ago, I had a problem with the manager at Jubilee Juice & Grill because of a large order my company placed. Something was forgotten and I called to inform them and they gave me a very bad attitude. I asked to speak to the manager, and unfortunately speaking with her was no better; she was just as rude and unprofessional.  As I mentioned previously, their food is delicious and was craving a burger today.  I called them, attempting to place an order with them and before I can give them my order, they said "I'm sorry, we have here in our computer that we cannot deliver to [my name], [my phone number], and [my work address].". I was in complete shock. Excuse me?!?! SIX years later, something you did wrong as a business serving the customer, and you penalize the customer? Very unsatisfying. I asked them why and they were unable to provide me with an answer, and the manager was unavailable. I thought to myself, that's ok, I'll have my co-worker place an order under her information. BUT, wait a minute. Forget that. I refuse they still take my money after they refuse to provide me with service. I'm not going to down the business, because I really like their Turkey Burgers and their waffle fries, they just need to work on their Customer Service skills and , really SIX years ago?! Inexcusable!

Just ordered off of Grubhub and it arrived FAST - as in 20 minutes later, which is a big plus.  Ordered the marinated chicken sandwich which was huge and had a great marinade sauce. Also ordered a side of waffle fries with cheese sauce on the side - Waffle fries were JUST like chickfilas (which I love) and the cheese sauce on the side was a game changer.  My smoothie (the blueberry banana smoothie) was good, but not quite on par with the chicken sandwich and fries.  All in all, this was a great delivery option and I highly recommend.
Pricey but good. Their smoothies are awesome and their chicken sandwiches are great too. They're open late and the quality of their food is just as good at nite which is a big plus.

First time here and poor customer service,  i was the only customer in the place on a Saturday afternoon. The cashier clearly hates her job and rolled her eyes when I asked her what is in the orange sherbet. I ordered the cold fighter smoothie and the next day guess what?  I caught a cold! It was probably going to happen anyways but the irony is just too much.

I ordered the vegetable quesadilla and I have been sick for 3 days. It could be a coincidence but not worth the risk. I typically only get a shake or juice from here and I will not order the food again.

I can not say a whole lot about the menu because the only thing I eat here is the Avacado Burger. I ordered it once & now its the only thing I order when I go. The waffle fries are also the bomb. The service is good but a little slow. I tend to order over the phone & just pick it up to not waste time on my breaks. They also have a huge juice selection.
Aside from then 30 minute wait for the food, I guess it's ok...unfortunately they screwed up my entire order. But I guess of you have the location it doesn't matter.

Came here for drunk food around 1 am on Friday. The chicken quesadilla was kinda weird. The cheese seemed like cream cheese. The onion rings were tasty. The baked potato with broccoli and cheddar had a very strange gloopy cheese sauce. Not delicious. When you're drunk, everything tastes good. The fact that this still did not taste good worries me so I am assuming this is a 2 star kind of place.

Ordered some food for pick-up on a rainy day. I'm kind of wishing now that I just had it delivered, but then again, I saved some money on that... What we ordered: Cheese fries: Criss-cut / Waffle fries with real Merk's cheese! I love the waffle cut fries. For some reason it does something wonderful with the texture of it. I also really liked how well the fries were seasoned, so even if you don't eat it with the cheese, there's still some great flavor to eat it alone. Turkey Burger: Recommended by my friend who swears it's the best turkey burger she's ever had. I thought it was super juicy and delicious. Went well with the fries! Jubilee Salad: Loved this salad! It's fresh, and the dressing was so good with everything. Mushroom quesadilla: This is a great vegetarian option. The mushrooms were so earthy and savory, and not overwhelming with the cheese. I had mine with salsa, but if you like sour cream, I can imagine it going really well with both the sour cream and salsa. Overall, it was a great, balanced meal. I'd like to go back and try a few of their other dishes.

Magic and wonder are waiting for you, though both will probably be covered in dressing.  (Just be forewarned.)  Fresh food, made-to-order.  Terrific chicken and turkey burgers.  Great vegetarian options, too.

Jubilee juice has good hours, and the food is pretty good good but it is extremely over priced for what it is. It is processed food sold for triple the price of McDonald's. When you place the order the staff gets very confused and it takes 15 minutes to get your order. I have been here several times but I'm tired of getting ripped off and I know I won't be back again.

Lunch time is always a challenge when trying to pick something to eat. The office is always debating on locations, but we can rest assured that when all else fails and no choice can be made Jubilee is always there! The portions are just right and you always leave with a satisfied stomach. At night when you are craving your waffle fries Jubilee will leave its light on for you.
The smoothies are the best I have ever laid my mouth upon! Sometimes, it can be a bit difficult to find something you would enjoy. The service is nice. It's like healthy fast food!

This place is great with good quality food, especially if you have a variety of appetites and dietary needs. The juices are fresh and tasty - they do not add ice, which is great! I usually get carrot/apple/beet/celery, or a similar combo. Always delicious. Our office has been ordering from Jubilee for about 2 years now, and have been able to try a large part of their menu. Highly recommend the hummus (fresh, a little spicy, and you get a LOT with tons of veggies and pita). They are not shy on portions. The soups vary but have always been great. Spinach and strawberry salad & dried cherry and gorgonzola salads are excellent (the cherries are soft, big plus!). The Alaskan salmon is also quality and cooked right, not dry. The guacamole and salsa are also great, and there is a lot that they give you as well. The only reason I gave 4 stars is because they do miss items a little too frequently when we order, but it is usually for a large group order at our office, and they always come back to deliver any items missed. They are also friendly and label all of the lunches! Have not tried the smoothies, but co-workers say they are amazing and haven't heard any complaints about their food. Have not been in the restaurant itself, but recommend for ordering.
Everything taste good n always fresh. Kinda pricey but worth it. Also open late. Waffle fries yummmm

We ordered from Jubille Juice & Grill for the office today. This is a regular spot for the office to have cater the lunches and I completely agree with the move. They are always on time and offer a wide variety of sandwiches and salads. The best part is they offer a wide variety of healthy options. I ordered the strawberry vinagerette salad with pears, walnuts and blue cheese. I find that many times a lot of restaurants that we order from offer salads that are not true entree salads but more side salads. The salad at Jubilee Juice & Grill certainly does not fall into that camp. The salad was fresh, delicious and filling. It also came with three small baguette slices which was welcome. I have been told the juice here is incredible. Next time I want to try the med salad, which looked like asparagus, peppers and hummus.

The food at this place was so amazing. The lady that works there is not. She answered the phone like the Dungeon Master and did not disappoint once I arrived. No warm, friendly greeting. No smile. She may as well had just growled. I'll go back. Hopefully Haggatha will be off.

Love this place.  The waffle fries are amazing and the veggie patty burger is really good too.  You certainly walk away full.  Though I've not tried the juices or smoothies yet I do get to see them preparing them.  They seem to use really good produce and fresh products.   I would recommend this place to my friends and family.
Chicken Sandwiches are very good. Great food selection in general! Smoothies are the best! This place is perfectly nested in an area known for their food, and they hold their own

Tasty stuff. But too pricey- by a long shot. And the counter girl (tall, thin, dark hair/features) is impossibly slow. Both in movement and comprehension... Smoothie was good. Mixed fruit plate was very good but nothing special.  Eh... Maybe again - maybe not

This place has decent food. It's pricey but I didn't go here often. At most, a couple times a month. I've ordered the Jubilee Chicken Sandwich with Waffle Fries several times and sometimes I order the Caesar Chicken Salad. I always call my orders in and arrive 20-25 min after that because they are slow. After today I won't be going back. I called my order in and they tell me it will be ready in 10min, which is never true with them. I get there 25 min after placing my order (it wasn't busy at the time). I paid, and walked to end of the counter expecting to get my bag-o-food. But the taller Eastern European girl there was just dropping my fries in the oil. When I asked her why my food isn't ready she lazily told me so that my fries are hot when I pick up. I then tell her the point of ordering in advance is so I don't have to wait when I get there and I don't have time to wait. Otherwise I would have just walked down there and placed my order in person. After listening to her excuses for a couple of minutes she rolled her eyes at me after I told her I expect my order to be ready on arrival. That's when I demanded my money back, which I got, and walked out.  This place is not worth the hassle. Their customer service is terrible.

Our office has ordered from Jubilee several times over the last couple of months and have never been disappointed! The food is amazing!!! Smoothies are enormous and sooo good! Ingredients are fresh and you can certainly tell. Veggie wrap is my #1 choice, followed by the Mediterranean salad with chicken. Highly recommend.

Love this place!!! My boyfriend and I order from here all the time and it is always amazing! They always make it fresh and the smoothies are out of this world! My favorite is the veggie sandwich and waffle fries with the oatmeal cookie  Plus we love that they have 24 hour delivery!! Definitely stop by or order out asap!!

Great smoothies!!! I consider myself somewhat of a smoothie expert, I must say this place ran circles around Jamba Juice.  I tried the Fruit Divine, which consisted on Blueberries, bananas, strawberries, pineapple sherbert, and peach juice. DELICIOUS!!!!  At home I don't use any type of sherbert/yogurt/sorbet, fruit and veggies only, so this was definitely something different for me, but I loved. it.

Smoothies are yummy. I grab one right before going to work. They never disappoint. They are not the best, but they are pretty good priced. I would not go out of my to come here, but if I were near I wouldn't avoid it like the plague either. I have not tried their food yet. I'll update when I do.

I love their smoked salmon sandwich with black caviar!  Also they have an amazing smoothies and fresh squeezed juices! My boyfriend really like different chicken sandwiches :) one bad think the customer service on phone not really friendly.

For a fast food kind of place you really can't do better. I've been dining in, taking out, and getting delivery from here for about 8 years. The smoothies and juices are what drew me in initially. Then it was the being open til 5am. The smoothie menu is extensive and they're all good. The juices are freshly made on the spot and much more reasonably priced than ANY juice bar; even the ones at grocery stores. Granted the selection isn't as large but its nice not to get ripped off for juice. The food excellent for the price and its fast. This is the kind of place where your salad will be just as good as burger and fries. If you can order it, they do it well. I like the Philly chicken when i'm not just smoothie'ing. The waffle fries are the best I've had anywhere in this city. As for the rest, the service is fast and friendly. They have extensive hours and delivery always comes in a reasonable time. The place is clean and simple.

I thought this place would be ghetto and overpriced, but the food here is surprisingly AMAZING! Especially the veggie burger omgz! The wait is a bit long but totally worth it. Wouldn't exactly hang out here but great food to go!
Ok this place was amazing! the food is made fresh and hot and just delicious. I was there 2 days ago and I'm already scheming on how I'm going to get back. They're open late so go, go, go!

$15 For a chicken burger very dry, fires and the shake are the ones that made it worth while ,and the question when asking for extra ketchup after spending $15 on a chicken burger  Milkshake and fires where the only good thing out of the meal

My go to ordering spot when i don't bring dinner to work. Everything i've ordered from here has been good. Burgers, salads, soup, chili, guacamole, and quesadillas. Delivery is good they get the food to me pretty quick almost every time. Will continue to order from here.

I had the char asparagus sandwich... YUMMY! Granted I had just stumbled upon this place after a night of drinking (so anything is probably good at that point), but I will definitely be back. The goat cheese, the veggies, a DELIGHTFUL tummy pleaser.
Just when I thought the mixed grill vegetables couldn't get any better, today they cut the veggies to bite size. Awesome.

Second visit. Tried something different. I ordered the Philly Steak, Chicken Gumbo and a Hanks Root Beer. Loved the Philly Steak. The meat was of great quality and was prepared to perfection. The Hanks Root Beer was one of the best root beers I had. On the other hand, the chicken gumbo was terrible. I'm from the South and we take our gumbo seriously. This was not gumbo and it tastes like chicken and rice soup. It's light colored with onions, okra and carrots.  Philly Cheesesteak = 5 stars  Chicken Gumbo = 1 star  Hanks Diet Root Beer = 5 stars They are still a four in my book but this was a 3 like visit.

My office orders lunch from here a lot and I've had mixed experiences. I've tried a bunch of different entrees including the cheddar and bacon baked potato, the turkey reuben and charred eggplant sandwich.  I found the baked potato to be a little strange... it was served with entire pieces of bacon plopped on it instead of sliced and diced bacon with a side of Merkts. They get bonus points on the Merkts but the whole thing was hard to eat and kind of underwhelming. I felt the same way about the turkey reuben which was also underwhelming, the sandwich was soggy and not very flavorful.  In contrast was the charred eggplant sandwich which was unbelievable. It was one of the most flavorful veggie sandwiches I've ever had and the french bread it came on was very fresh.  I've also tried the fries which were not bad and an amazing smoothie, the Orange  Berry Dream.  I think now that I've found my order I'm going to enjoy Jubilee Juice a lot more, I just don't think the quality of their food is consistent overall.

Open late + SMOOTHIES + Delivers + Unfortunately I couldn't give this place 5 stars because although their salads are both huge and fresh, I was disappointed as to how little toppings they put on them each time i've ordered them.  I would return but to try other things.

Although I did not have the juice, which I would hope is good, this is a way overpriced fast food joint that is not that fast. The 9$ salmon burger was the worst I have ever had, dry and tasteless. Might as well have bought some freeze section patties. Burgers were overpriced and dry as well! Go down the street and get some real food from any other randolph restaurant.

The mighty has fallen!  Combo Meal still serves 2. Mushroom Burger -- the patty was super dry.  It seems like the patty mix had been changed.  Decent amount of mushrooms.  The taste is NOT there. Waffle Fries -- crunchy but slightly uncook.  You can smell potatoes in every bite. Housemade Tiramisu -- for $3.75, it was a 2x2 one layer with a predominant mascarpone.  Skip it!
I am obsessed with their char grilled asparagus sandwich with goat cheese. It is always amazing!
I had the Mediterranean salad. It was a ton of cheap lettuce, a few cherry tomatoes, and a decent amount of cheese.  Not worth the almost $8 price tag.

You know those immaculate burgers and sandwiches in the McDonald's and Burger King ads? This is where they're at. The food here looks perfect and it tastes amazing, unlike those misleading ads. I had the chicken sandwich (no tomatoes, no tomatoes EVER) and it was actually refreshing. Yes, it was fat but I didn't feel bad about eating it, especially when I paired it with an apple-pear-ginger root juice. The waffle fires where cut and cooked to perfection. Just.... So good. Wish I wasn't so broke, or I would come here all the time to get the fresh juices. They also have an interesting selection of gourmet sodas, and fun wall art to look at while you eat.

This place has the best quesadillas! They also have great salads. I usually get the caesar salad with shrimp. Delivery is quick and food is fresh! I order from here about 4-5 times a month. Check it out!

The asparagus sandwich with goat cheese is SO good!! I want one right now! This place has a large menu with lots of great options. I found exactly what I like so I don't think I'll be trying a lot of it though - sad face. My only problem is that the wait time is SO long.

We went here based on so many 5 star reviews.  We were not impressed with the food or decor.  It wasn't bad, but it wasn't OMFG good either.  Chicken sandwiches are about $8 each.  Smoothie is $6.  Street parking is $4/hr.  Add all that up and you are looking at $30 lunch for two.  The sandwiches are big, but again nothing special.

This review could be total bull because I had this place after bar time. Found it on the way back to where I was staying off pure luck cause food was needed at that point in the night. I got the Avocado Burger. Let me tell you..... as Subway says..... it is avocado season. This burger was very large and very delicious. This place gets 3 stars due to the yuppie group of kids that followed me in there. These kids might have well have been hungry from sailing on their yacht by the looks of them and they clearly could not hold their booze. Also the burger yet tasty was harshly overpriced. With that price I should have gotten fries and a drink.  I will visit again for further inspection.

Love this place. I have ordered from here at least 10 times in the last month. Food is great. Orders are ready in 10 min. Lot of vegetarian options. And their smoothies - kick ass.  Regular is as big as power Jamba Juice.

Jubilee Juice!! Catchy Name ... Today I ordered my lunch from there .I took my first bite. Awesome flavor & taste. I'm a vegetarian , These guys have lot of veggie options . Red Pepper  sandwich is too good. They taste real good. The smoothie is good. Small is also good for 2 people. Dine in is bit small place. It's mostly for take out order.

Jubilee is an easy weeknight carry out, but also makes a heavenly hangover lunch. The food is definitely fresh and tastey, but not exactly 'healthy' if thats what you're looking for. Boyfriend and I have a "usual" that consists of the honey mustard chicken sandwich and raspberry mania smoothie for him, the jubilee chicken (goat cheese) sandwich and tropical passion smoothie for me, and an order of waffle fries to share.  mmmmmmmm! waffle fries. They are dangerous, you've been warned!

Maybe walk in service is good. But delivery was an experience I will never put my self in again. Well I am still in shock that this place actually exists. If customer service is a word in the cashier's vocabulary she must think it means I, the customer, should be serving her.  She actually said to me she was too busy to deal with me. She's the cashier as if that gave her free reign to not deal with food missing. Then proceeding to put me on hold until I recalled her. I was expected to wait and hope my food would show up at some point. The deliver guy showing up a half an hour after it's due looking sheepish like he knows he screwed up. With no apology what so ever for me having to track down where our food was. Luke warm food upon delivery in the end. I doubt the food is ever worth delivery from this place. But hey they seem like they are too busy to deal with the phone so crack on with the walk in stuff.

This place has been my quick healthier choice when I'm on the run. By far my favorite item on the menu is the hummus. Everything is always very fresh and the smoothies are always on point. I've been coming here for the past few years and definitely will continue to do so.
Huge and filling portions and no matter what you order be sure to get the waffle fries they are the perfect side to almost any dish.

This place is solid.  It's my neighborhood go-to "fast food" joint.  And by "fast food" I mean a strawberry salad with grilled chicken.  I must admit, I've had a couple bites of the burger and waffle fries, and those are good too.  They also have a great selection of delicious smoothies.

Maybe it's just because I live in the neighborhood but I've been to this place at least 50 times over the past few years. I've never eaten in, I always order delivery or pick it up. They are very quick to get orders out and they have never messed up my order.  The chicken sandwiches are all great and their smoothies are delicious too. It's a great place to order late night now that they have extended their hours Monday-Saturday but be ware of the drunkies on Friday and Saturday night. ;)  If you are eat here frequently, don't forget to grab a punch card for smoothies and sandwiches so you have a free meal to look forward to in the future.

Awesome spot for a sandwich. Very tasty burgers. Their best work are their chicken sammys. Charcoal grilled (I believe) to perfection. Every time I order one it is tender, juicy and with just the perfect charbroiled flavor. On a pita, heaven. Not much of a sit down atmosphere, but no big deal. Also, great freshly juiced smoothies. This place is usually open late night, also a plus.

Not bad. I've had food here before a while ago and I think it was good. This afternoon, went back there and plunked down $6 for a 24oz of pure juice. It's really good, fresh juice, but expensive. I would still rather splurge here than Jamba Juice though.

This is the holy grail of late night dining. After several failed attempts to find dinner at 2 am (traveler's diet?) I yelped for a spot to grab anything even close to edible and found Jubilee. This place is amazing!! I ordered a chicken burger and got a ginormous grilled chicken breast on a delish fresh bun with all fresh condiments on it. The BF and I also split chips and guac, and damn Chicago, where'd you find these avocados?? There goes the thing that makes California so special...Chips were perfection and the guac was so good that when we ran out of chips I started eating it with a spoon. To top it off, I ordered an orange juice and it was super fresh. It was so fresh that it made me wonder if they had their own orange tree growing in the back, mm! I honestly never thought I would eat meal so heavenly at such a late hour! If I lived in Chicago this would be my go to place for late night food binges or study hours!

Waffle fries and a cup of cheese please! This place has some great food. Smoothies are yum! They have a little sitting area on the side or you can call in your order for pick up. I always order the Buffalo Chicken which can be really spicy at times. Their burgers are huge! Great food and customer service. Love this place.

An unsuspecting cheesy facade tries to trick unknowing customers. These customers should not be deterred by this tactic.  Smoothies are made in a real restaurant size juicer with a young attendant shoving every veggie in by hand and looking as if she has lost her last friend. Can't say as I blame her as it must be a tedious, mind-numbing task. The smoothies here are NOT made from a package and taste like it. Like it was made from real things. You know like nature things. Good for your body things. Want Jamba Juice. AKA 700 calories, go there. 'Cold fighter', was the name of my smoothie and it will probably be my go to this winter. They don't just have all 'granola' type items though. They also have waffle fries. These fries also come in a variation of cheese fries. I was expecting the cheese to be just the regular velveeta in a cup style you get from every other greek take-out, gyro place. BUT, wait, no. These are Merk's cheese fries. You know, real Wisconsin cheddar cheese. Yeah, you know. You are just pretending like you don't. Bottom line, best cheese fries I have every had in my life hands down.  It's expensive for fast food, yes. Totally worth every penny, at this point in my life I am a quality over quantity person. But I still enjoy a naughty food treat every once in a while. Balanced out with a real fruit smoothie makes me feel good about myself. And that, my friends, is worth a million dollars. (Evil pinky to lip...)

The smoothies was the best thing out of the order. We order delivery which needs to be mentioned, perhaps better fresh in house. I  had the all american burger which was OK have had better, the fries were not as reviwers had stated. My coworker ordered the grilled chicaken it was dry with no favor. Will go back only if I s  was in area for a smoothies

One of the reasons why I miss living in the Northside is due to places like this with their late hours.  Came upon here because I was too lazy to walk to my intended restaurant and was pleasantly surprised.  Love that they have waffle fries here and the chicken sandwich I ordered here was amazeballs. chicken and portobello mushroom?  What I do remember clearly is how tender and juicy the chicken (huge btw) was.  I can only compare it to Square Bar's California chicken sandwich... But ya know what.  I think I may of enjoy Jubilee's more.

I live across the street. This place is open super late. I find myself here often.  Waffle Fries - Best I ever had. Even better with the merkt's cheddar on the side.  Burgers - Though they are not cheap, you get what you pay for. They are large and in charge. All american is my fave b/c I'm a purist, but my hubby swears by the Avocado burger.  Salads - They are good, but I'll be honest, I'm not ordering them often enough to say any more than that.  Smoothies/Fruit Juices - They have every possible fruitylicious combination of juice or smoothie concoction your heart desires. They aren't cheap, but they are delicious. I even see them pressing out fresh wheat grass shots, if that's the kind of thing that whets your appetite.  Sometimes gets crowded during lunch, and the entry is awkward b/c it leads right into the door, but its a solid spot to grab a good, substantial bite with a side of healthy. They have a small, narrow seating area as well.  Do get there punch cards, b/c you will eventually get a free sandwich if you eat here often enough.  Good spot for quality food in the West Loop, they even deliver till super late.

Small little pleasant find.   They have everything on the menu - salads, burgers, smoothies, fruit, dessert, a little bit of everything.   I had the fruit plate.   It had the usual melons, strawberries and an apple.  All of the fruit was fresh and delicious.  My friend had a mango smoothie which was so delish but a little sweet.   There was a guy sitting next to us who had a burger and fries that looked amazing.   I also saw a chicken cesear salad that looked good.   I definitely want to go back and try everything!

We needed a lunch option- one vegan, one health nut, and me. I had worked in this hood for most of my early adulthood and I so I wouldn't have to eat the same thing two days in the row- let alone something so healthy it would shock my system. I shouted out this place. We, I should state got carry out. What I ended up with was the Mixed Veggie Sandwhich- which turns out to actually be a wrap. I freaking HATE wraps. Why didn't they just call it a wrap? Anywho it was so freaking delicious I devoured it in record time. I tore off as much wrap as humanly possible without sacrificing the structure of the "sandwhich". I also got a juice- carrot, beet, celery, and something or the other. Totally yum. I had thought about getting a smoothie but it's all yogurt and sherbit and sugar.  I dig the healthy options along with the naughty.

Jubilee Juice is a God Send.  Since seeing that movie Fat, Sick and nearly Dead, I've been drinking their fresh juice and wheat grass.  I can just go there and tell them what I want and the juice are great.  The also, has sandwichs that are one of the best in the city of Chicago.   Also, their customer service is great was well and they stay open late till 5am on Fri and Sat. -Robert Jones

I Order from here all the time. Food is really good!!  I like that they are a healthier option open late (4am)  Usually get the marinated chicken sandwhich!  Kinda expensive for a fast food place but they give you alot of food!
